registrationId.description: LWM2M registration scope in which data has been received

senMLMessage.description: A SenML-JSON representation of the data received from the device

bn.description: The base name string which is prepended to the Name value of the entry for forming a globally unique identifier for the resource.

bt.description: The base time which the Time values are relative to.

t.description: The time of the representation relative to the Base Time in seconds for a notification. Required only for historical representations.

v.description: Value as a JSON float if the Resource data type is Integer, Float, or Time.

vb.description: Value as a JSON Boolean if the Resource data type is boolean.

vd.description: For Resource data type "opaque" this holds the Base64 encoded representation of the Resource.

vlo.description:
Value as a JSON string if the Resource data type is Objlnk.
Format according to LWM2M 1.2 spec, Appendix C. Data Types (Normative) (e.g. "10:03").

vs.description: Value as a JSON string for all other Resource data types.

items.description: This class models a SenML record according to the LWM2M 1.2 Core specification

sourceOfDataM.description: Describes how the the LWM2M data was received

timestampDataReceived.description: Timestamp in ISO ZONED TIME format (ISO 8601). Example: 2024-11-21T14:24:51.136319Z

description: Models a set of LWM2M values that have been received by the LWM2M service
